title: For surrender of the gross area of the land which is subjected to acquisition, free of cost and free
clause_text: For surrender of the gross area of the land which is subjected to acquisition, free of cost and free from all encumbrances, the owner shall be entitled for TDR or DR irrespective of the FSI permissible or development potential of such land to be surrendered and also that of land surrounding to such land at the rate given below :-
section: Generation of the Transferable Development Rights (TDR)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
